title: Drawing, "Round Table, Wood and Metal", 1937–38
medium: Graphite and red ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in red ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: F.S. LAYOUT/OF WOOD & METAL TABLE/TYPE 43311.; below: DRWG # 43311; upper right, upside down: Polished Brass; lower right: ORDER/NO. 170; lower right corner: # 170 [crossed out] # 1647; dimensions, notes, materials in graphite
description: Plan and perspective drawing for circular table. Wood table top with polished brass base of squared tubes, geometric pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Round Table, Wood and Metal", 1937–38.
1937–38. Graphite and red ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-642.
